text: Kɨ Saimon Pita, kɨ Krais Iesusɨn ingangarir gumazim ko an aposel. Kɨ, ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavir aghuim itiba, akar kam ia bagha an osiri. Krais Iesus en God, a en Akurvazir Gumazim. Egha a uan arazir aghuimɨn God nɨghnɨzir gavgavir aghuim ia ganɨngizɨma, ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavir kam, a enanam ko voroghɨra ghu.
